title: ‘It’s an Arms Race’: George Bennett on Rise of the WorldTour’s ‘Super Teams’
content:
New Zealand climber looking for new opportunities in two-year deal to join Israel Premier Tech: 'I was always riding to help Roglič or Pogačar.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s an Arms Race’: George Bennett on Rise of the WorldTour’s ‘Super Teams’ on Velo.
author: ahood
